field.label: Add Cached Product URLs to Sync
field.comment: By default Magento will resize catalog images and then cache them. This ensures that only the relevant size of image is then loaded. If it is not found, the placeholder images is then used. This option is recommended to be enabled to prevent large images from being synced accidentally. If you are unable to use cached images reliably, disable this option. If this option is changed, it is recommended to perform a full sync of products again via the mapp:export:products command to ensure everything is then up to date

field.label: Generate Resized Product Images during Sync
field.comment: To be sure that all of your cached images exist when syncing your products, you can enable this option. Be warned, however, that this will decrease the performance of the export as it will be generating the two resized files if they don't exist for each product when synced.
